Reviews.Title: exceeds expectations
Reviews.Author: Stefan Schütz
Reviews.Content: first, the equipment coming along with the camera is numerous and most of it quite usefull (extra accu, SD card, tripod, protective bag and display sheets...).The camera is handy, not too heavy and the feeling is valuable. the display is large enough to see what you focus on and the resolution is very good. Compared to my previous digital cameras, the 18x zoom is incredibly good!All in all, this camera takes very nice pictures and is convenient for every amateur photographer who's interested in quick-and-nice photos to capture moments before they are gone. It's not a high-end camera, but if you are looking for a low-prized handy one, which nevertheless makes good shots, then you should consider the Samsung WB250F.

Reviews.Title: reply to email
Reviews.Author: book lover
Reviews.Content: Yes comes with a charge. Got it as a gift for my daughter. She loves that it can share photos anytime she wants as long as wifi is near.

ProductInfo.Features:
Capture properly exposed images in low-light situations with the 14.2-megapixel BSI (Back Side Illuminated) CMOS sensor, which needs less light than conventional sensors
The Hybrid Touch User Interface offers 2 options. The 1st is to use the 5-way button to quickly move the cursor up, down, left & right to intuitively navigate the menu & make selections on display. The 2nd is used when you want to enter text, such as an email address, for when you're sharing photos
Capture 1920x1080 Full HD video with life-like color and sharp detail. Shoot longer, too--the camera's H.264 format allows longer recording than a camera with MJPEG video does. When you're done, you can watch your HD footage on an HDTV
A quick tap of Smart Mode and you're set with various special modes. Capture trails of light at night on a busy intersection full of red taillights, or instantly capture a high-speed scene with Sports Capture
Focus manually or use the TTL autofocus, with the following modes: Center AF, Multi AF, Tracking AF, Face Detection AF, Face Recognition AF, Selection AF
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung WB250F 14.2 Megapixel Wi-Fi with 3-Inch Touch Screen Smart Digital Camera in Black + 16GB Secure Digital Memory Card + Deluxe Design Digital Camera Case + Flexible Tripod, Memory Card Wallet, 3pc Cleaning Kit & 3 Screen Protectors + Micro Fiber Cleaning Cloth
